mapper.select: SELECT id, user_id, balance, locked_balance, bank_code, account_number, account_holder, version, created_at, updated_at FROM woorido.accounts WHERE user_id = #{userId}
mapper.update: UPDATE woorido.accounts SET balance = #{balance}, locked_balance = #{lockedBalance}, version = version + 1, updated_at = SYSTIMESTAMP WHERE id = #{id} AND version = #{version}
mapper.select: SELECT NVL(SUM(ABS(amount)), 0) FROM woorido.account_transactions WHERE account_id = #{accountId} AND type = 'WITHDRAW' AND created_at >= TRUNC(SYSTIMESTAMP) AND created_at < TRUNC(SYSTIMESTAMP) + 1

SELECT NVL(SUM(ABS(amount)), 0) FROM woorido.account_transactions WHERE account_id = #{accountId} AND type = 'WITHDRAW' AND created_at >= TRUNC(SYSTIMESTAMP, 'MM') AND created_at < ADD_MONTHS(TRUNC(SYSTIMESTAMP, 'MM'), 1)
